title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions:
Introducing the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel. This 32oz water bottle is designed with a captivating Dreamy Field pattern that will make you stand out wherever you go. 

Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, this double-wall insulated bottle ensures your drinks stay cold for up to 24 hours. The FreeSip spout type features a built-in straw and a convenient swig opening, allowing you to sip on your favorite beverages effortlessly. 

The push-button lid is not only easy to use, but it also comes with several handy features. With a lock mechanism and protective design, you can rest assured that your drinks are safe and secure. The lid is also dishwasher safe, making cleaning a breeze. The cup of the bottle requires hand washing for best results.

Safety is a top priority with this Owala water bottle. It is BPA-free and phthalate-free, ensuring that no harmful chemicals come into contact with your drinks. Please note that this bottle is not suitable for hot liquids.

In addition to its functionality, this water bottle also offers convenient features. The carry loop doubles as a lock, allowing you to easily carry it around or attach it to your bag. The wide opening makes it easy to add ice cubes for an extra refreshing experience.

Choose the size that suits your needs, with options available in 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce capacities. This Owala water bottle also comes with a limited lifetime warranty, giving you peace of mind with your purchase.

Stay hydrated in style with the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw. Perfect for sports, travel, and everyday use.
